original: ORSTEDT, Sven Adolf, Direktör, Stockholm, f Ronneby 19/11 98 av köpm Axel Olsson o Augusta Bolmér, gm Anne-Marie Johansson. Realex m kompl hdlsskolor. Anst skpsmkl Victor Abrahamson Ronnebyredd 15 —19, kamr Smides AB Bröd Lundberg & Co 19—33, vkst dir o tekn led där sed. 33, vkst dir AB Laxå Mek Verkst Laxå sed. 43, ag dsa bolag, ag fastigh Volmar Yxkullsgat 13 Sthlm o Rättarboda gård, Bro. Ordf Smidesverkst riks-frb, styr.led Sthlms Smides- o Mek verkst.idk frn o Sthlms Fastigh.äg.frn. Stud.res Danm, Tyskl, Holl, Belg, Frankr, Tjeckoslov 29. Hobbies: Lantbruk, trädgårdsodling.
translated: ORSTEDT, Sven Adolf, Director, Stockholm, born in Ronneby on November 19, 1898, to merchant Axel Olsson and Augusta Bolmér, married to Anne-Marie Johansson. Attended secondary commercial schools. Employed at Victor Abrahamson Ronnebyredd as an apprentice broker from 1915 to 1919, then at the firm Smides AB Bröd Lundberg & Co from 1919 to 1933, holding the position of chamberlain. Became deputy managing director and technical leader there in 1933, and later became managing director of AB Laxå Mekaniska Verkstäder in Laxå from 1943. Also served as a board member and shareholder in several companies, and owned properties at Yxkullsgatan 13 in Stockholm and Rättarboda estate in Bro. Was chairman of the national association for blacksmith workshops and held positions on the boards of Stockholm's blacksmith and mechanical engineering businesses as well as Stockholm's property owners association. Undertook study trips to Denmark, Germany, the Netherlands, Belgium, France, and Czechoslovakia in 1929. Hobbies: Agriculture, gardening.

career.occupational_title: Deputy Managing Director and Technical Leader
